document_data.name: Fargas Rumblefoot
document_data.mainbody: '''Fargas Rumblefoot''' was a [[lightfoot halfling]] adventurer in the [[Silken Paths]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
The [[halfling]] went to the [[Underdark]] with his adventuring party in search of the [[Lost Tomb of Khaem]], but they were attacked by mad [[gnoll]]s. He escaped alone into the Silken Paths and was captured and cocooned by a [[giant spider]].

During the late 1480s or early 1490s DR, a party of adventurers escaping [[drow]] slavers of [[Velkynvelve]] may have found and freed him.
